skillTree.localised_description: A horse can outrun Orcs, Trolls, even Giants. Not arrows. Or Doom Divers. But it still helps.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit's vigour is less affected by fatiguing actions, such as combat.

skillTree.localised_description: Persuading a Warboss to flee is much easier with a repeater rifle from the Empire. Expensive, but worth it.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit's vigour is less affected by fatiguing actions, such as combat.

skillTree.localised_description: The enemy might expect the old "What is that?!" trick, but there are other ways to distract them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit cannot run and will only move at walking pace.

skillTree.localised_description: The Goddess of Battle protects Her own.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Getting to shoot or otherwise ambush an unaware enemy is an art of its own. Just like cutting throats.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: An orc that has been shot down is an orc that isn't going to chop anybody.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +5% for cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +5% for Missile Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +5% for Missile Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Losing the initiative is losing the battle.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Enforcers and Light Scouts
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +3 for Enforcers and Light Scouts
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Behind each safe child in the towns there is a Ranger that has bled for him.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Out here, only the toughest survive.

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Militia Spearmen, Militia Archers, Half-Pikes and Billmen

skillTree.localised_description: Limited numbers and overwhelming foes require unorthodox combat tactics.

effects.description:
Attribute: Immune to psychology for Border Rangers, Enforcers and Light Scouts
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Don't ask them about living on the edge. Or huge green things with teeth.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +5% for all units (Rank 4 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Well, this is straightforward enough.

skillTree.localised_description: Oh wait, there's another chapter.

skillTree.localised_description: Even the lousiest commander knows that you need two halves of a pair of scissors.

skillTree.localised_description: The key is not letting your initiative depend on a lucky die.
It's seldom enough to have only some of your troops to be ready to take a beating. The enemy has their own plans.

skillTree.localised_description: "You kill them before they kill you, sonnie. That's all it is."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Though of course, if they do stab you, you better know how to parry."

effects.description:
Melee defence: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Plus, you better kill them dead with the one shot you have."

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "And to do that, it helps if you put all your weight where it counts."

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +2% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Look, at the end of the day, you may be alive and you better learn from what didn't kill you."

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.
A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: "I shall wear midnight... and many knives."

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Be where the enemy expects you not.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit's vigour is less affected by fatiguing actions, such as combat.
This unit can fire while on the move.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
A regal air? Let's see how long that lasts.
"The smallfolk should be thankful - without us, who would they work for?"

effects.description:
Construction time: -25% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."
The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.
